description: Would you Like to Have a Glowing Looking Skin and Healthy Hair?"The Skin and Hair Nature's Secrets in One Package"Your Skin is About to Get Indulged and Rejuvenated With This Gift From Nature That:- Revitalizes, Softens and Maintains Skin Moisture.- Naturally Rich in Vitamins A, E & F.- Helps Restoring Skin Elasticity.- Soothes  Eczema and Prevents/Removes Stretch Marks.- The Shea Nut smell is Removed Maximizing Your Experience.- Doesn't Clog Pores & Block Hair ShaftLagrange Body Care Shea Butter Benefits Include:Vitamin A & E.Normalize and balance the skin. Vitamin A provides the skin with healthy collagen preventing premature wrinkles and re-generates skin cells.Vitamin F.Soothes rough, dry or chapped skin, softens and revitalizes dry or damaged hair. Vitamin F consists of essential fatty acids responsible for skin and scalp healing.Beeswax.Locks in moisture, fosters cells and protects skin from damaging environmental factors. Beeswax's anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and antioxidant properties make it a very effective wound-healing agent.Jojoba Oil.Keeps skin healthy and glowing. Prevents skin from environmental damage. Its structure closely resembles the skin's own natural sebum so it is easily absorbed and helps in the treatment of Eczema.For those with dry, sensitive and Challenged skin condition such as eczema and stretch marks, we know that you will love this product.Go and add it into your cart now and indulge your skin with a drench of Natural Healing Moisture.
title: Shea Butter - 100% Natural African Ultra Rich Raw Shea Nuts Including Other Organic Ingredients- Intense Long Lasting Moisturization - Easily Absorbed Into Your Skin - Heals Extremely Dry, Rough or Damaged Skin -Naturally Rich in Essential Vitamins A, E & F for Skin Balance, Skin Cells Regeneration and Rejuvenation, Can Help Preventing and Removing Skin Stretch Marks.
